featured.text: As a record number of fans showed up for the baseball final, the highways around the stadium were with traffic all day.

definition.zh_def: 一種大型的運動場地，通常用於舉辦體育賽事和其他大型活動。
definition.en_def: A large venue for sports events and other large gatherings.
definition.example: The stadium was filled with cheering fans during the championship game.
